trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> for media content.

<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> object which provides control over media timing in the same way that animation timeline objects control animations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> é um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objeto que fornece controle sobre o tempo de mídia da mesma forma que os objetos de timeline animação controlam animações.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> has associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> properties can be used to specify when media begins and how long it plays.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> associada <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> propriedades podem ser usadas para especificar quando a mídia começa e quanto tempo ele é reproduzido.

trans-unit.source: See [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md) for more information on animation timelines.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [visão geral de animação](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md) para obter mais informações sobre linhas de tempo de animação.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to associate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement> using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline>.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras para associar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement> usando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline>.

trans-unit.source: Inside of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, when a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> is targets a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock> will be created and assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>’s associated player.
trans-unit.target: Dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, quando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> é destinos um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>, um <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock> será criado e atribuído ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>associado do player.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control a MediaElement by Using a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-by-using-a-storyboard.md) for an example;
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: controlar um MediaElement usando um Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-by-using-a-storyboard.md) para obter um exemplo;

trans-unit.source: By explicitly creating a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock> from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> and assigning it to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar explicitamente uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock> de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> e atribuí-la a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> is set to `Automatic` (default), the duration of <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> is the natural duration of the media source.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> é definido como `Automatic` (padrão), a duração da <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> é a duração natural da fonte de mídia.

trans-unit.source: To find the natural duration of the media source programmatically, query the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.NaturalDuration%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.
trans-unit.target: Para localizar a origem de mídia durante natural programaticamente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.NaturalDuration%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> class.
The time to begin the timeline.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> that begins at the specified time.
The media source for the timeline.
Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> class using the supplied Uri as the media source.
The time to begin media playback.
The length of time for media playback.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> that begins at the specified time and lasts for the specified duration.
The time to begin media playback.
The length of time for media playback.
The repeat behavior to use when the playback duration has been reached.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> class that begins at the specified time over the specified time and has the specified repeat behavior.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock" /> for this timeline.
A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock" /> for this timeline.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> to clone.
Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" />.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> método e não deve ser chamado diretamente no seu código de exceção ao chamar a implementação base ao substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma cópia modificável do objeto atual, chame <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> em vez de chamar este método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> to clone.
Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> using current property values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> método e não deve ser chamado diretamente no seu código de exceção ao chamar a implementação base ao substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma cópia modificável do objeto atual, chame <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> em vez de chamar este método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" />.
The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock" />.
Creates a new instance of the MediaTimeline.
The new instance.
<see langword="true" /> to check if the timeline can be frozen; <see langword="false" /> to freeze the timeline.
Makes this instance of MediaTimeline unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.

If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is <see langword="true" />, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> can be made unmodifiable, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is <see langword="false" />, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> is now unmodifiable, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made unmodifiable, with the side effect of having made the actual change in frozen status to this object.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> object to clone and freeze.
Makes this instance a clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> object.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e referências de recurso (mas eles não podem mais resolver), mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que, se essas propriedades contêm referências de recurso ou associações de dados, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> falhará quando tentar congelar o objeto e lançará um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> método e não deve ser chamado diretamente no seu código de exceção ao chamar a implementação base ao substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma cópia congelada do objeto atual, chame <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> em vez de chamar este método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> to copy and freeze.
Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" />.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> método e não deve ser chamado diretamente no seu código de exceção ao chamar a implementação base ao substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma cópia congelada do objeto atual, chame <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> em vez de chamar este método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> whose natural duration is desired.
Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from a specified clock.

If <paramref name="clock" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock" />, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.NaturalDuration" /> value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> associated with <paramref name="clock" />, or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" /> if the <paramref name="clock" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock" />.
Gets or sets the media source associated with the timeline.
The media source associated with the timeline.
trans-unit.target: A origem de mídia associada com a linha do tempo.

trans-unit.source: The default is **null**.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é **nulo**.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline.Source" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the base URI of the current application context.
The base URI of the application context.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base do contexto do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string that represents the media source.
The string that represents the media source.
